definition: (main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture
husband of younger female cousin via male line

sentences.english: Jennifer and Joe are my cousins.
sentences.chinese: 詹妮弗和喬是我的堂妹和堂弟。

sentences.english: The cutest baby over there is Tim's daughter.
sentences.chinese: 那可愛的女孩是我的堂妹。

sentences.english: This is my cousin, Wang Yihuan. She's studying in Beijing University. She often comes to our home.
sentences.chinese: 她是我堂妹，王一歡，在北京大學讀書，經常來我家。

sentences.english: Bob: You aren't familiar with this city. What are going to tell to your cousin?
sentences.chinese: 你不熟悉這座城市，那你準備告訴你小堂妹什麼？

sentences.english: The cousin fears when canaliculus too, call my back her, I disrelish a trouble, did not manage her.
sentences.chinese: 堂妹過小溝時害怕，就叫我揹她，我嫌麻煩，沒理她。

sentences.english: Across the way their widowed first cousin lived in a yellow house.
sentences.chinese: 住在她們對面的黃色房子裏的是她們寡居的嫡親堂妹。

sentences.english: The girl in red is my cousin.
sentences.chinese: 穿紅衣服的女孩是我的堂妹。

sentences.english: His cousin is the girl in the blue pants and striped shirt.
sentences.chinese: 他的堂妹是那個穿着藍褲子和條紋襯衣的女孩。

sentences.english: To which fair cousin should I compliment the excellence of the cooking?
sentences.chinese: 是哪位堂妹的廚藝如此高超，令我稱讚不已？

sentences.english: My cousin is the same age as me .

definition: younger female cousin via female line
younger male cousin via female line
older female cousin via female line
older male cousin via female line
wife of older male cousin via female line
older male cousin via female line
